website_summaries.verdict: High-quality ingredients that get the job done and also taste good.
pros: Herb-based and formulated to enhance workouts as well as other experiences enhanced by testosterone
We love that it helps throw in an extra few sets at the gym
Doesn't require drastic lifestyle or diet changes to benefit from the supplement
cons: Ideal for working out but not overall health

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 40 year old male probably have average testosterone level. Being 40 would not mind a boost. Because of that I have tried several different testosterone boosters and estrogen blockers and out of all of them I noticed the least difference in this particular one. Energy levels did not change. Did not increase desire to exercise. The horny goat weed herb levels must be particularly low because no difference whatsoever there. I have found that if you buy the $12 bottle of horny goat weed extract. And a $10 bottle of the cheap testosterone booster here on Amazon , take it separately, makes a world of difference. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Osage Kid

customer_reviews.title: I feel better, and I am getting compliments from co-workers and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a product to help me with energy between work, kids, and chores around the house. I take three capsules in the morning, and I have more energy for my long days. I feel better, and I am getting compliments from co-workers and clients who tell me I look good. They even ask me what I'm taking. I recommended your product to them.
customer_reviews.author: juli

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I love PRO T and take it daily. The boost isn't apparent at first, but after consistent use, I am feeling the effects daily now! The ingredients are all natural so you don't have to worry about putting something in your body that is foreign, etc. The pills are on the bigger side, but taking one at a time is no problem at all. Big Fan! I think I will be a buyer for life - if you're unsure about PRO T, give it a try - you won't regret it!

With the addition of PRO-T I’ve noticed a punch of additional energy and I feel GREAT taking both products. No noticeable side effects. Highly recommended supplement combo for increased energy, suppressed appetite and impressive weight lose thus far with zero side effects, unlike similar products I’ve tried in the past.

customer_reviews.title: Great product that I noticed a difference with on the 1st day!
customer_reviews.text: Great product,I noticed a difference in my energy the 1st night I took it since I work 12 hour nights,I take my medicine and supplements with me in one of those weekly pill boxes but forgot it the 3rd night and could tell a difference for sure. By the 7th or 8th hour into the shift I was dragging and just wanted to let my eyes fall shut and take a nap or get a caffeine rush which I kept myself from doing haha. I eat a light healthy snack just before taking since I have a sensitive stomach like a banana or applsauce,just something light. I would recommend you try this product.

customer_reviews.text: Wow...Just Wow! A friend recommended this product so I gave it a shot and ordered it for my boyfriend.....I've gotta tell you, I was blown away! He's in his 50's and was struggling with energy and his libido had taken a hit as well. I was shocked at his responsiveness even after the first day....and it has continued! Don't wait to order this great product...it's so economical and the payoff is...well, huge! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Suzi S

customer_reviews.title: No pill is going to boost testosterone
customer_reviews.text: I have finally come to the realization that no little capsule filled with herbs and artificial ingredients is ever going to raise testosterone. This product is simply another among many that promises an easy solution to the credulous who engage in deluded and wishful thinking. The fact of the matter is that yes testosterone declines with age. However, this can be effectively countered with daily exercise and staying away from high sugars and carbs that raise insulin.

customer_reviews.title: All natural testosterone booster that works!
customer_reviews.text: Just turned 40 and Dr. said my testosterone levels were low. Tried Pro T since its all natural. Been taking it for 3 weeks now an can really tell a difference, really helps out on days I go to gym for weightlifting. I may just keep using it for a pre-workout boost.

Now with pro t I have enough energy to get out and play pickup games with kids at practice and I haven't done that in years. So glad I listened to a friend when they told me about it

product_meta.title: Got Low T Get Pro T Test Booster Estrogen Blocker and Testosterone Booster for Men & Women Prime Muscle Growth Male Test Boost Strongest Safest Natural Supplements That Work Pills Powder Capsules
product_meta.description:
Did you use to be the man of the house, but now you feel more like a house boy?

You are not alone. The FDA estimates that 5 million American men may suffer from Low T, but only a fraction are treated.

Symptoms may include:

Low sex drive

Fatigue

Reduced muscle mass

Inability to concentrate

Luckily Low T is treatable, but the problem is prescription remedies are dangerous for women and children and can cause your body to actually reduce natural T production.

That is why we developed PRO T. With only the highest quality, proven ingredients that give your body what it needs for improved energy and Low T support.

You might be asking, what is the difference between ours, and other test boosters on the market?

Our PRO T contains only the most potent and natural ingredients you need to boost T levels, without any potentially harmful 'other ingredients' you find in other products, at a fraction of the cost.

See, there is an ugly little secret that the supplement industry does not want you to know.

Most test boosters provide low amounts of low quality ingredients that only address part of the hormone balance equation.

At Prometheus Wellness, our premium test booster provides clinical doses of research-backed ingredients focusing on hormone balance, including an estrogen blocker as well as test boosters.

For example:

Vitamin D, Zinc, and Boron Citrate: Scientifically proven to support testosterone production

DIM (Diindolymethane): A proven estrogen blocker

Herbal energy support: Such as Ashwagandha, a popular adaptogen

That's it! No unusual ingredients. No fluff or filler. Just ingredients you need for results.

Supplementing for Low T support no longer needs to be confusing or frustrating. Go with the brand you can trust will ‘tell it like it is’ and give you products you need for results!
feature_bullets: SUFFERING FROM FATIGUE AND LOW ENERGY? Prometheus Wellness PRO T natural free testosterone t booster for men and women estrogen blocker for muscle growth and low t has the best and strongest ingredients in 90 capsules to help boost t levels and block estrogen production to counteract fatigue and low energy!

FEELING LIKE A GRUMPY OLD MAN? Imbalanced hormones can make you feel horrible! It can even cause you to grow moobs! Don't be a sissy little mouseboy (or an oversized one)! If you want to feel like a real man again; try our proven formula to regain your manhood and vitality! Your girl will thank you (and us)!

DAD BOD WEIGHING YOU DOWN? Yeah, we ain’t scared, we said it! Low T and high estrogen levels cause mens bodies to retain fat, grow breasts, and lose muscle mass. As you get older you need to counteract this process in your body. We have the proven natural formula that will give you the vitamins, minerals and herbs you need to rebalance your body, support muscle growth and get back to feeling like yourself.

TROUBLE BUILDING MUSCLE? Your body needs certain vitamins, minerals and hormones such as testosterone to support muscle growth from your workouts, especially as you get older. Our new test booster supplements are all natural and give your body the most effective highest rated low cost ingredients it needs to support your hormone production and workout regimen, with very few potential side effects.

LOST INTEREST IN THE BEDROOM? Let's be honest, it can happen to anyone. But you gotta love your girl! You need to regain your status as the man of the house! It's not your fault that your hormones may change over time, but you can take control. Our proven, effective, legal test boosters are a crucial piece to the puzzle for your testerone replacement therapy. Prometheus Wellness provides the highest quality supplements on the market; we guarantee it!
